snippet: The flash Markit/HSBC Purchasing Managers’ Index fell to 50.5 but for a fifth consecutive month remained above the line that separates expansion of activity from contraction.
lead_paragraph: The flash Markit/HSBC Purchasing Managers’ Index fell to 50.5 but for a fifth consecutive month remained above the line that separates expansion of activity from contraction.

headline.main: Output Falls at Chinese Factories, Survey Shows
headline.print_headline: Output Falls at Chinese Factories, Survey Shows
